snippet: Mr. Alia, was a cult-of-personality enforcer who succeeded Enver Hoxha and presided over halting and often chaotic moves toward democracy before his own downfall in 1992.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Alia, was a cult-of-personality enforcer who succeeded Enver Hoxha and presided over halting and often chaotic moves toward democracy before his own downfall in 1992.

headline.main: Ramiz Alia, an Enforcer for a Dictator and Later Ruler of Albania, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: Ramiz Alia, an Enforcer for a Dictator And Later Ruler of Albania, Dies at 85
headline.seo: Ramiz Alia, Former Ruler of Albania, Dies at 85
